summary: Diff adds a 6-page TanStack Router frontend with shared header/footer, themed styling, SEO hook, gallery lightbox, menu tabs, and a contact form wired to a new Motoko backend. Several requirements appear partially met, but key AC gaps remain around About content verbatim, backend stable persistence/return values, and no-reload behavior on Contact success.

missing_requirements.requirement: About Us page must render the provided About content exactly (verbatim).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows a custom About paragraph, but the BuildRequestâ€™s "provided About content" is not present in the diff, so there is no evidence the text is verbatim.

missing_requirements.requirement: On successful Contact form submission, show success confirmation without page reload.
missing_requirements.reason: Success state includes a button handler that calls window.location.reload(), which is a full page reload.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend stores inquiries in stable memory across upgrades.
missing_requirements.reason: Backend uses in-memory Map and a mutable counter, but there is no evidence of stable variables or postupgrade/preupgrade logic to persist across upgrades.

missing_requirements.requirement: Inquiry creation returns an identifier or confirmation that the frontend can display as success.
missing_requirements.reason: submitContactForm returns async () and does not return an id/confirmation value.

missing_requirements.requirement: Include the provided keywords naturally in relevant page copy and/or meta descriptions: "Best Caterers in Bikaner", "Wedding Caterers in Bikaner", "Marwari Catering Service", "Royal Catering Bikaner".
missing_requirements.reason: Meta titles/descriptions shown do not contain the full provided keyword phrases (e.g., "Best Caterers in Bikaner", "Marwari Catering Service", "Royal Catering Bikaner") and visible copy evidence is incomplete due to truncation; there is insufficient evidence the specified keywords are included as requested.

hallucinated_features.description: User profile management APIs (get/save user profiles) and related authorization checks.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for saving contact inquiries; user profile features are not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin/permission access-control system with secret-token initialization and admin-only lead listing.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest asks for a backend query to list inquiries for debugging, but does not request an admin auth system, secret token URL parameter handling, or role permissions.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity integration and identity-aware actor creation for an otherwise public marketing/contact site.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest states Internet Identity only if authentication is ever needed later; no authentication requirement is specified for this build.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer attribution/marketing link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested as part of footer requirements; could be considered extra/unrequested outbound link content.
